text: Futhi ngubani ongenabo ubulungiswa kakhulu kunalowo oqambela uMvelinqangi amanga noma athi, “isambulo safika kumina” kube kungekho isambulo esafika kuyena nalowo othi “ngiyokwembula isambulo esifana naleso asembula uMvelinqangi” futhi uma ungazibona izoni zisebuhlungwini bokufa ngesikhathi izingelosi zelula izandla zazo (zithi) nikelani imiphefumulo yenu namhlanje nizothola umvuzo wesijeziso esiyihlazo ngenxa yalokho enanikusho ngoMvelinqangi okungesilona iqiniso futhi naniqholosha (niphika) amavesi akhe
